entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a student who always forgets to jump. He is described as giving an ungainly wobble.

entities.name: golden egg
entities.description: The golden egg is still damp from the bath and slipped from under Neville's arm.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak slipped when Harry snatched at it.

entities.name: marauder’s map
entities.description: The Marauder's Map fluttered out of Harry's hand and slid down six stairs.

relationships.description: Neville lost the golden egg when it slipped from under his arm.
Harry snatched at the Invisibility Cloak.
Harry lost the Marauder's Map when it fluttered out of his hand.
